roles.name: CLERK
roles.description: Employee who verifies, rejects and approves the RP application

roles.name: JA
roles.description: Employee who verifies, rejects and approves the RP application which is approved by clerk

roles.name: SA
roles.description: Employee who verifies, rejects and approves the RP application which is approved by clerk

roles.name: SI
roles.description: Employee who verifies, rejects and approves the RP application which is approved by SA

roles.name: CA
roles.description: Employee who verifies, rejects and approves the RP application which is approved by SI

roles.name: SURVEYOR
roles.description: Employee who verifies the Trasit site and uploads the documents for capturing transite site images

roles.name: APRO
roles.description: Employee who manages the public relations for transit sites for rented properties
